title: PUCSL approves 13-hour power cut for tomorrow
body_lines: The 13-hour power cut which had been proposed by the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) for tomorrow (31) was approved by the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) a short while ago.
Accordingly, power shedding will be imposed in the areas A, B, C, D, E and F for three hours from 3 a.m. to 6 a.m. Four hours from 12.00 pm to 4.00 pm and another six hours from 6pm to 12am.
Power outages will last three hours from 12 a.m. to 3 a.m., four hours from 8 a.m. to 12 p.m., and six hours from 4 p.m. to 10 p.m. in areas G, H, I, J, K, and l.
Power outages will last three hours from 3 a.m. to 6 a.m., four hours from 12 p.m. to 4 p.m., and six hours from 6 p.m. to 12 a.m. in areas P, Q, R, and S.
Power outages will last three hours from 12 a.m. to 3 a.m., four hours from 8 a.m. to 12 p.m., and six hours from 4 p.m. to 10 p.m. in areas T, U, V, and W.
Meanwhile, three-hour and thirty-minute power cuts from 5.30am to 9am and a two-hour power cut from 4pm to 6pm will affect the areas M, N, O, X, Y and Z. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
